insert.foreach:
insert into stock_abstract_info
clp,
cust_id,
cntr_no,
seal,
cntr_weigh,
create_time,
update_time,
#{item.clp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{item.cust_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{item.cntr_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{item.seal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{item.cntr_weigh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{item.create_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{item.update_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
on duplicate key update clp = #{item.clp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cust_id = #{item.custId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cntr_no = #{item.cntrNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seal = #{item.seal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cntr_weigh = #{item.cntrWeigh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{item.createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
